Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/ Monitor
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division,Central,Augusta,Austin,and Division due to, street blockage near Division/ Monitor.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  via Division,Central,Augusta,Austin,and Division due to, street blockage near Division/ Monitor.

Allow extra travel time.
